channel.title: Solar Energy on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Solar Energy on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Catch The Sun
item.description: Recently, a video has been making the rounds online that highlights a stunning fact: We so expect cheap calculators to have solar charging capabilities that manufacturers will go to the lengths of putting a fake solar cell onto those calculators to keep up the illusion. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uLTDuGhqE2w If you haven’t seen this video—strap in, it’s 18 minutes long—you will soon find yourself questioning everything you know about life, love, and technology.
